summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image shows a crafting menu from a video game, where the player can create new armor. The highlighted item is "Serpentscale Bracers," classified as uncommon. It provides +7 Defense and +3 Poison Resistance, and has a special ability called "Wave-Rider" that significantly reduces stamina cost when in water. The crafting requirements are 25 Yarn and 1732 Will, with the player currently having 720 Will. On the right side, a character wearing a mask is visible, along with various stats such as health, attack, and defense. The UI includes options to examine, view details, or return. A text hint at the bottom reads, "I recognize you. You're no noble."
